name: Radio
description: Mdm K is an elderly client known to Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC), who stays alone in a 3-room flat. Mdm K has limited mobility and mostly home bound. THKMC is looking for a portable radio (battery operated) for Mdm K to reduce loneliness and encouraged her to be socially engaged. If you know of someone who has the items for donation, please contact Siti Asmah at 97708144. The recipient is located at Ang Mo Kio Street 61. Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services. THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.

THKMC is looking for wound dressing iteams such as Opsite/tegaderm, gauze and saline. If you know of someone who has the items for donation, please contact Qhairah Qhaliesah (Case Manager) at 9177 6614 or Qhairahqhaliesah@thkmc.org.sg Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services. THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.

They are also unable to tap on their extended relatives for financial support as they have their own financial difficulties as well. However, the current comcare assistance amount is insufficient for the family's basic needs as it did not account for the newborn's needs. The hospital is also unable to help with milk and diapers for the newborn. As such, we are hoping that a kind donor could support the family with 4 packets of Huggies Platinum Justborn Tape Diapers 24pcs and 2 tins of Nestle Lactogen 1 Infant Milk Formula 1.8kg, for them to last for the baby's first month. If you would like support with the newborn's milk and diapers for the next 2-3 months too, you can let me know, as the family would need some time to stabilise themselves too, with the arrival of the newborn. I have pictures of the milk and diapers baby is using now. Please feel free to email me during office hours. Thank you so much for your help!

name: Sponsor for movers
description: Mdm S is an elderly client known to Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC). She is moving to a2 room rental flat in Yishun in Oct 2022. THKMC is looking for a donor to arrange for movers for the client (1 way trip) If you know of someone who has the items for donation, please contact Qhairah Qhaliesah (Case Manager) at 9177 6614 or Qhairahqhaliesah@thkmc.org.sg Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services. THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.
